parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Failure due to Low Oil
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the engine due to low oil can cause the vehicle to stall, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: no oil warning indicators appear despite regular maintenance.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden explosion of the sunroof can cause distraction, injury, or accidents.
The lack of an anti-theft feature makes the vehicle an easy target for theft, which can lead to financial loss and safety concerns.
symptoms: easy theft using a USB cable.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and unnecessary activation of the forward collision warning system can cause accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: forward collision warning system activates unnecessarily.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brakes can cause accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
The sudden loss of power can cause accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
The sudden loss of control of the steering wheel can cause accidents, injuries, or fatalities.
The failure of the electric steering column motor can cause a rubbing noise, which can lead to a loss of steering control, potentially resulting in accidents.
symptoms: The steering wheel makes a rubbing noise.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission overheating and failure can cause the vehicle to lose power, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: and scrubbing sound when turning the steering wheel.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Vehicle Theft Due to Design Flaw
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The design flaw in the key start system allows thieves to steal the vehicle using a USB cord adapter, leading to financial loss and increased insurance rates.
The vehicle pulling to one side can cause loss of control, leading to accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle pulls to the right without the lane assistance system being activated.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Brake failure can cause loss of control, leading to accidents.
symptoms: The passenger side front wheel locks up
causing the vehicle to turn sharply and potentially crash.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the engine oil system can cause engine damage, overheating, and potentially lead to engine failure, resulting in a loss of power and control, which can increase the risk of accidents.

The failure of the crank pulley system can cause engine damage, loss of power, and potentially lead to engine failure, resulting in a loss of power and control, which can increase the risk of accidents.

The failure of the DCT can cause unexpected loss of acceleration, sudden stops, and stalling, which can lead to accidents, especially at high speeds. It can also cause damage to the transmission and other components, resulting in costly repairs.
symptoms: Abrupt stops or loss of acceleration while driving
especially at low speeds; grinding sounds
or unusual noises from the transmission; rough or jerky shifting; vehicle stalling or shutting off while in drive; smoking from the vehicle.
